extendedInfo.description: Optimized to blow your mind with a dazzling display and spot-on performance.**GAME ALERT** Play Bejeweled Blitz. Treat yourself to an exciting take on the world's #1 puzzle game from PopCap! New players Get 100,000 Coins Free. http://smarturl.it/blitzMATCH AND BLASTMatch sparkling gems 3 at a time to make them burst into showers of color and points STUNNING COMBOSBlast 4 or more to create power gems that boost your score and your mood with brilliant cascades and combosCHOOSE YOUR STYLESoar to gem-matching heights in Classic mode, or speed through matches against the clock in Action modeCEASELESS CHALLENGESFor more high-carat fun, bump up your brainwaves with multi-faceted puzzles, or enter the Zen state of Endless playDONâT GIVE UPIf you canât spot the next match, hints-on-demand can help!Are you ready to be dazzled? Put some SHINE on your MIND with this challenging, addictive title.  As always - due to the rich, immersive quality of this game - your download will take some time. We promise itâs worth the wait!Be the first to know! Get inside EA info on great deals, plus the latest game updates, tips & moreâ¦VISIT US: eamobile.com/androidFOLLOW US: twitter.com/eamobileLIKE US: facebook.com/eamobileWATCH US: youtube.com/eamobilegamesCheck out more exciting games from EA like The Sims FreePlay, Need for Speed Most Wanted, Theme Park, World Series of Poker, and FIFA 12!For more information about the third party targeted ad serving and analytics technology in this app and data they collect, see End User License Agreement:http://tos.ea.com/legalapp/mobileeula/US/en/GM/

reviews.title: Not current version
reviews.comment: I cannot believe I paid almost $3 for this out of date version! I have been playing on my iphone 4s and it does have the Zen option and is MUCH faster! I am very disappointed.
reviews.author: Skye Myers

reviews.title: Enter a name?
reviews.comment: Why does it ask me to enter a name after EVERY SINGLE GAME? Am I missing some multi-player setting or something?  It\'s just me playing.  Why would I need to enter a name every time?  It\'s very annoying.
reviews.author: Steven Cameron

reviews.title: Does not load
reviews.comment: I was thrilled to finally see this available for Android.  Unfortunately it starts up gives a message of checking for a license then the screen just stays black. This is on a Galaxy S III running 4.1.2
reviews.author: Robert Berkowitz

reviews.title: It\'s ok
reviews.comment: The one I had on my iphone is 10x better than this version. It had more graphics and more game modes like zen and butterfly. This version is in great need of an update.
reviews.author: Kevin Thomas

reviews.title: Original and still great
reviews.comment: This was one of my favorite Pocket PC games ever.  I played it on and off for many many years.  Nice to have it on the Android.  Works great - no issues on my Galaxy S2.
reviews.author: Al Harrington

reviews.title: Bejunked
reviews.comment: This is an out of date version for $3.11.  Its slow and not what I expected. Don\'t buy if you\'re use to playing on an iphone. This needs the latest version upgrade.
reviews.author: Winston Robinson

reviews.title: Better than nothing
reviews.comment: Bejeweled is one of the best games ever. Too bad Bejeweled Blitz isn\'t on the play store, like it is on iOS. Fail.
reviews.author: Leo Howell

reviews.title: Good game but we need these...
reviews.comment: We need a music and sound update because I like action mode\' s first song on PC. And I also think that you should add puzzle mode and player roster.
reviews.author: Aiden Smith

reviews.title: What happened to the old game?
reviews.comment: First I purchase a game I loved and played... and it was removed. Now they game is back up but it\'s nothing like it was before.  There should not be a 2 behind it. And it sucks...
reviews.author: Crissy Dalbec

reviews.comment: I could get a refund within 15 mins of purchase, but it took 2 hrs to download and when it did it said insufficient memory...I have 7GB :/
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not what i expected
reviews.comment: I feel limited in what you can do. Any to have more added to it to give it a better feeling.  and definitely a better variety of graphics
reviews.author: Zach Mullins

reviews.title: Remove that stupid warning note
reviews.comment: Can  you remove that stupid green note that comes up every time I make a move that doesn\'t line up 3 gems! It\'s annoying!
reviews.author: Roman Malyuta

reviews.title: Thank you
reviews.comment: This game is awesome just like the computer one the only defrince is that is has no puzzle mode and it doesnt say welcome back when you get on or goodbye when you get of this is the only reson I gave only four stars but ad puzzle and I will rate five
reviews.author: Micah Lowther

reviews.title: Y u no update?
reviews.comment: Seriously i want to play blitz on my phone and this game is seriously outdated. Why? You guys need to get with the program for Androids
reviews.author: Jessica Rodriguez

reviews.title: It\'s still a fun game but...
reviews.comment: I bought this version because my GF wanted to play her favorite game at locations where there is no WiFi connection.  This version won\'t allow it. I also got a BT mouse to play it with because she plays the PC version that way, but this version won\'t allow playing the game using it.   The FREE Bejeweled Blitz allows both unconnected play and BT mouse use. I wonder if the developers can change these behaviors so she can enjoy her game the way she is accustomed to playing it. Here\'s hoping for an update soon!
reviews.author: Rex Dietrick

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: You can only play if you have Internet connection. It checks your license EVERY game. How stupid! Stupid! Stupid!
reviews.author: Chris Swortzel

reviews.title: Update the series.
reviews.comment: I like bejeweled but this is rediculous! This game is old! You need to update bejeweled and get the latest games of bejeweled for android because i am upset that you care a lot about apple and act like android doesn\'t exist. I mean, come on!
reviews.author: Jes Wiegel

reviews.title: Got Droid? DO NOT BUY!!
reviews.comment: Slow to utterly lethargic.  Freezes every 10-15 minutes.  Infuriating waste of money.
reviews.author: Stephanie Wittenberg

reviews.title: Love this game
reviews.comment: Been wanting it on my note 2 since I got the phone... so glad it\'s now compatible.
reviews.author: Rachel Heiss

reviews.title: Don\'t waste your money!
reviews.comment: This game is slow with poor graphics. Incredibly outdated compared to the iTunes version with Zen Mode, Mini Games and superior game quality. Don\'t waste your money. This game is very much not worth it!!!
reviews.author: Reid Williams
